import { useState } from 'react' import Header from '../Utils/header' function BankAccountForm () { const [creditType, setCreditType] = useState('debit') // 默认选项是借记卡 const handleCreditTypeChange = (event) => { setCreditType(event.target.value) } const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() // 在这里处理表单提交 } return (
) } export default BankAccountForm
